reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and she explains complex concepts clearly. Very approachable during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! His passion for programming is contagious. Challenging assignments, but extremely rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting course material, but lectures can be dry. Grading is fair, though feedback is sometimes delayed.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia brings history to life with his storytelling. Exams are tough but fair. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Course content is difficult, and Dr. Lee's teaching style doesn't help. Lab sessions are disorganized.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is an excellent teacher who relates economic theories to real-world scenarios. Very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's passion for literature is evident. Assignments encourage critical thinking. Sometimes goes off-topic in lectures.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable professor, but can be intimidating. Lectures are fast-paced and sometimes hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez creates an inclusive classroom environment. Discussions are thought-provoking and assignments are interesting.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex math concepts. Homework can be challenging, but Prof. Kim is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Inspiring professor who makes you care about environmental issues. Field trips are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable about the subject, but can be biased in discussions. Grading is sometimes inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's lectures are like walking through a museum. Assignments encourage creativity alongside analysis.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures that challenge your worldview. Prof. Taylor is excellent at facilitating class discussions.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Dr. Rodriguez is enthusiastic, though sometimes the workload can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Lee has real-world experience, which is valuable. However, lectures can be dry and heavy on theory.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Wright makes anthropology accessible and exciting. Great balance of lectures, discussions, and hands-on activities.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Nelson is passionate about music. Classes are engaging, though some concepts can be challenging for beginners.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher and teacher. Dr. Gonzalez explains complex neurological concepts clearly and engagingly.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Baker knows his stuff, but can be impatient with questions. Course material is well-organized.
